abstract: Richard Greenfield of Pali Research says he doesn’t have any inside knowledge on the matter, but he is speculating that Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation is likely to abandon its closely watched effort to acquire Dow Jones — at least for the moment.
lead_paragraph: Richard Greenfield of Pali Research says he doesn’t have any inside knowledge on the matter, but he is speculating that Rupert Murdoch’s News Corporation is likely to abandon its closely watched effort to acquire Dow Jones — at least for the moment.

headline.main: Is Murdoch Getting Ready to Walk?
